segment.source: Sensors in a device based on the magnetometer – the compass, inclinometer and orientation sensor - can become in need of calibration due to environmental factors.
segment.target: Sensors in a device based on the magnetometer – the compass, inclinometer and orientation sensor - can become in need of calibration due to environmental factors.

segment.source: The MagnetometerAccuracy enumeration can help determine a course of action when your device is in need of calibration.
segment.target: The MagnetometerAccuracy enumeration can help determine a course of action when your device is in need of calibration.

segment.source: When to calibrate the magnetometer
segment.target: When to calibrate the magnetometer

segment.source: The MagnetometerAccuracy enumeration has four values that help you determine if the device your app is running on needs to be calibrated.
segment.target: The MagnetometerAccuracy enumeration has four values that help you determine if the device your app is running on needs to be calibrated.

segment.source: If a device needs to be calibrated, you should let the user know that calibration is needed.
segment.target: If a device needs to be calibrated, you should let the user know that calibration is needed.

segment.source: However, you should not prompt the user to calibrate too frequently.
segment.target: However, you should not prompt the user to calibrate too frequently.

segment.source: We recommend no more than once every 10 minutes.
segment.target: We recommend no more than once every 10 minutes.

segment.source: | Value | Description |-----------------|-------------------| | Unknown | The sensor driver could not report the current accuracy.
segment.target: | Value | Description |-----------------|-------------------| | Unknown | The sensor driver could not report the current accuracy.

segment.source: This does not necessarily mean the device is out of calibration.
segment.target: This does not necessarily mean the device is out of calibration.

segment.source: It is up to your app to decide the best course of action if Unknown is returned.
segment.target: It is up to your app to decide the best course of action if Unknown is returned.

segment.source: If your app is dependant on an accurate sensor reading, you may want to prompt the user to calibrate the device.
segment.target: If your app is dependant on an accurate sensor reading, you may want to prompt the user to calibrate the device.

segment.source: | Unreliable | There is currently a high degree of inaccuracy in the magnetometer.
segment.target: | Unreliable | There is currently a high degree of inaccuracy in the magnetometer.

segment.source: Apps should always ask for a calibration from the user when this value is first returned.
segment.target: Apps should always ask for a calibration from the user when this value is first returned.

segment.source: | Approximate | The data is accurate enough for some applications.
segment.target: | Approximate | The data is accurate enough for some applications.

segment.source: A virtual reality app, that only needs to know if the user has moved the device up/down or left/right, can continue without calibration.
segment.target: A virtual reality app, that only needs to know if the user has moved the device up/down or left/right, can continue without calibration.

segment.source: Apps that need an absolute heading, like a navigation app that needs to know what direction you are driving in order to give you directions, need to ask for calibration.
segment.target: Apps that need an absolute heading, like a navigation app that needs to know what direction you are driving in order to give you directions, need to ask for calibration.

segment.source: | High | The data is precise.
segment.target: | High | The data is precise.

segment.source: No calibration is needed, even for apps that need to know an absolute heading such as augmented reality or navigation apps.
segment.target: No calibration is needed, even for apps that need to know an absolute heading such as augmented reality or navigation apps.
